page.title: 09Fashions.
page.content: In 1985 the most popular hairstyle for girls is the 'bob' look and for boys it is anything very short. The 'bob' hairstyle is done in many variations and colours but the basic look is flattened hair down the back of the neck with a diagonal slope of hair up the forehead. This style dates back to Egyptian times and like many other styles, comes into fashion every few years. The fashion world goes up like a spiral and effectively to go one step forward you take two steps back. Even though people claim things to be new fashions you are to find it somewhere else in fashions long history. Now if you wanted your hair coloured, you would either have the dye sprayed, fingered or combed in.
